item.title: Deep Dive in to AWS Resource Control Policies
item.description: This article is on one of the new features AWS released recently, called Resource Control Policies (RCPs). RCPs are a new way to enforce policies on data (resources) rather than principals in AWS. For principals, the way to enforce policies is to use Service Control Policies (SCPs), which if you’re already familiar with AWS would know plenty about. However, RCPs can still be a little confusing. What are RCPs?
